job_details.Functieomschrijving:
In overleg
   Medior, Senior
   Den Haag
   Through your machine learning solutions, you create simplified processes for our customers and help us establish ourselves as 'digital first'. With a solution-oriented and active mindset, you come up with technical solutions, using AI models.
   Direct solliciteren Neem contact op

   Through your solutions, the data team and the AI team create more business value. In addition to creating business value, knowledge transfer and coaching are also an important part of your job. The goal is to take the engineering skills of your fellow data scientists to the next level, among other things by following best practices.

What you are going to do

   You are able to take the lead in devising and designing AI-driven applications. We are currently mainly building state-of-the-art applications with (OpenAI's GPT) LLMs. An important point of attention here is that everything is secure, scalable and repeatable. You will work closely with the Data Scientists to improve the Machine Learning Lifecycle. The focus is on code quality, CI/CD, testing and monitoring. Security is an important part of your application and you are aware of the compliance rules within NN. If you would love to experience an overlap of AI, Software and Data Engineering in your work, then this is your place.
     * You will develop a scalable solution that will generate email responses to incoming emails using LLM agentic frameworks (Langchain, Langgraph)
     * You bring AI models (data products) to production, for example in the form of APIs
     * You develop and maintain the machine learning infrastructure, fitting into the NN landscape
     * You develop AI applications based on CI/CD, high-quality code, testing and monitoring, Who you will work with

   You will be working in our Competence Center, where we work on applications for the business through projects. Your team includes several data scientists and a machine learning engineer. You will work closely with your fellow machine learning engineer. We also work with various end-to-end teams, all of which exchange specialist knowledge. In this way, we work very efficiently on scalable solutions. In this process, we learn a lot from each other. Our ambition is to become even better at AI.

   Together we work on state-of-the-art solutions, in Python and in the (Azure) cloud. In your work, you experience a lot of freedom and responsibility. That ensures that you continue to grow. In the team we work hybrid, where we meet together at the office at least once a week.
job_details.full_text:
Machine Learning Engineer - LLM Agents

In overleg
   Medior, Senior
   Den Haag
   Through your machine learning solutions, you create simplified processes for our customers and help us establish ourselves as 'digital first'. With a solution-oriented and active mindset, you come up with technical solutions, using AI models.
   Direct solliciteren Neem contact op

   Through your solutions, the data team and the AI team create more business value. In addition to creating business value, knowledge transfer and coaching are also an important part of your job. The goal is to take the engineering skills of your fellow data scientists to the next level, among other things by following best practices.

What you are going to do

   You are able to take the lead in devising and designing AI-driven applications. We are currently mainly building state-of-the-art applications with (OpenAI's GPT) LLMs. An important point of attention here is that everything is secure, scalable and repeatable. You will work closely with the Data Scientists to improve the Machine Learning Lifecycle. The focus is on code quality, CI/CD, testing and monitoring. Security is an important part of your application and you are aware of the compliance rules within NN. If you would love to experience an overlap of AI, Software and Data Engineering in your work, then this is your place.
     * You will develop a scalable solution that will generate email responses to incoming emails using LLM agentic frameworks (Langchain, Langgraph)
     * You bring AI models (data products) to production, for example in the form of APIs
     * You develop and maintain the machine learning infrastructure, fitting into the NN landscape
     * You develop AI applications based on CI/CD, high-quality code, testing and monitoring, Who you will work with

   You will be working in our Competence Center, where we work on applications for the business through projects. Your team includes several data scientists and a machine learning engineer. You will work closely with your fellow machine learning engineer. We also work with various end-to-end teams, all of which exchange specialist knowledge. In this way, we work very efficiently on scalable solutions. In this process, we learn a lot from each other. Our ambition is to become even better at AI.

   Together we work on state-of-the-art solutions, in Python and in the (Azure) cloud. In your work, you experience a lot of freedom and responsibility. That ensures that you continue to grow. In the team we work hybrid, where we meet together at the office at least once a week.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes building applications with LLMs using agentic frameworks like Langchain and Langgraph, aligning directly with the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer. The focus on developing user-facing AI-driven applications, productionizing models as APIs, and working with LLMs like GPT further solidifies this classification.

phrases.text: Through your machine learning solutions, you create simplified processes for our customers and help us establish ourselves as 'digital first'.
phrases.justification: This phrase highlights the goal of using ML solutions to improve customer processes and achieve business objectives ('digital first'), indicating an understanding of business needs.

phrases.text: Through your solutions, the data team and the AI team create more business value.
phrases.justification: This directly states the objective of generating business value through technical solutions, demonstrating an understanding of business impact.

phrases.text: The goal is to take the engineering skills of your fellow data scientists to the next level, among other things by following best practices.
phrases.justification: This indicates a focus on improving team capabilities and adopting best practices, which is a business-oriented goal related to team development and efficiency.

phrases.text: You are able to take the lead in devising and designing AI-driven applications.
phrases.justification: Taking the lead in designing applications implies understanding the business problem that the AI application is intended to solve.

phrases.text: An important point of attention here is that everything is secure, scalable and repeatable.
phrases.justification: Security, scalability, and repeatability are business requirements that influence technical design and implementation.

phrases.text: You will work closely with the Data Scientists to improve the Machine Learning Lifecycle.
phrases.justification: Improving the ML lifecycle contributes to overall business efficiency and value delivery.

phrases.text: The focus is on code quality, CI/CD, testing and monitoring.
phrases.justification: These are operational aspects that directly impact the reliability and efficiency of delivering business value through software.

phrases.text: Security is an important part of your application and you are aware of the compliance rules within NN.
phrases.justification: Awareness of compliance rules and security requirements are business-level concerns that must be addressed in technical solutions.

phrases.text: If you would love to experience an overlap of AI, Software and Data Engineering in your work, then this is your place.
phrases.justification: This highlights the interdisciplinary nature of the role, aiming to leverage different engineering domains to achieve business goals.

phrases.text: Our ambition is to become even better at AI.
phrases.justification: This states a clear business ambition related to AI capabilities.

phrases.text: You will work closely with the Data Scientists to improve the Machine Learning Lifecycle.
phrases.justification: Improving the ML lifecycle often involves aspects of data pipeline management and data flow, which are core to data engineering.

phrases.text: You develop and maintain the machine learning infrastructure, fitting into the NN landscape
phrases.justification: Developing and maintaining infrastructure, especially for ML, often includes data pipelines and data storage considerations.

phrases.text: In your work, you experience a lot of freedom and responsibility.
phrases.justification: While broad, this can encompass the responsibility for data infrastructure and pipelines.

phrases.text: using AI models.
phrases.justification: General mention of using AI models.

phrases.text: We are currently mainly building state-of-the-art applications with (OpenAI's GPT) LLMs.
phrases.justification: Directly mentions building applications with LLMs, which falls under generative modeling.

phrases.text: You will develop a scalable solution that will generate email responses to incoming emails using LLM agentic frameworks (Langchain, Langgraph)
phrases.justification: This is a core modeling task involving LLMs and agentic frameworks for a specific generative task (email response generation).

phrases.text: You bring AI models (data products) to production
phrases.justification: This implies working with and deploying AI models.

phrases.text: You develop AI applications based on CI/CD, high-quality code, testing and monitoring
phrases.justification: Developing AI applications inherently involves the modeling aspect, even if the focus is on integration and deployment.

phrases.text: Our ambition is to become even better at AI.
phrases.justification: This overarching ambition implies continuous improvement and development of AI models.

phrases.text: you come up with technical solutions, using AI models.
phrases.justification: Developing technical solutions that incorporate AI models requires software development skills.

phrases.text: You are able to take the lead in devising and designing AI-driven applications.
phrases.justification: Designing and devising applications, especially AI-driven ones, involves significant software development effort.

phrases.text: An important point of attention here is that everything is secure, scalable and repeatable.
phrases.justification: Ensuring applications are secure, scalable, and repeatable are key software development concerns.

phrases.text: You will work closely with the Data Scientists to improve the Machine Learning Lifecycle.
phrases.justification: Improving the ML lifecycle often involves building tools and integrating systems, which are software development tasks.

phrases.text: The focus is on code quality, CI/CD, testing and monitoring.
phrases.justification: These are fundamental aspects of modern software development practices.

phrases.text: Security is an important part of your application and you are aware of the compliance rules within NN.
phrases.justification: Implementing security and ensuring compliance within an application are core software development responsibilities.

phrases.text: If you would love to experience an overlap of AI, Software and Data Engineering in your work, then this is your place.
phrases.justification: Explicitly mentions 'Software' engineering as a key component of the role.

phrases.text: You will develop a scalable solution that will generate email responses to incoming emails using LLM agentic frameworks (Langchain, Langgraph)
phrases.justification: Developing a scalable solution using frameworks involves significant software engineering.

phrases.text: You bring AI models (data products) to production, for example in the form of APIs
phrases.justification: Exposing AI models as APIs is a common software development task.

phrases.text: You develop AI applications based on CI/CD, high-quality code, testing and monitoring
phrases.justification: Developing AI applications encompasses the full software development lifecycle.

phrases.text: Together we work on state-of-the-art solutions, in Python and in the (Azure) cloud.
phrases.justification: Working with Python and cloud platforms to build solutions is a direct software development activity.

phrases.justification: Improving the ML lifecycle is a direct MLOps responsibility, encompassing deployment, monitoring, and maintenance.

phrases.text: You bring AI models (data products) to production, for example in the form of APIs
phrases.justification: Bringing models to production and managing their deployment (e.g., as APIs) is a fundamental MLOps task.

phrases.text: You develop and maintain the machine learning infrastructure, fitting into the NN landscape
phrases.justification: Developing and maintaining ML infrastructure is a direct MLOps responsibility.

phrases.text: You develop AI applications based on CI/CD, high-quality code, testing and monitoring
phrases.justification: Implementing CI/CD, testing, and monitoring for AI applications is a core MLOps function.
